results.title: Bioassay, determination and separation of enantiomers of atenolol by direct and indirect approaches using liquid chromatography: A review.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@, a beta-adrenergic receptor antagonist, is a chiral compound used for the treatment of @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@ and to treat @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@, @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Sinus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013616 @@@sinus tachycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@, where it acts preferentially upon the beta-adrenergic receptors in the heart.

citations.NLM: Batra S, Bhushan R. Bioassay, determination and separation of enantiomers of atenolol by direct and indirect approaches using liquid chromatography: A review. Biomed Chromatogr. 2018 Jan;32(1):. PMID: 28905405
citations.BibTeX: @article{28905405, title={Bioassay, determination and separation of enantiomers of atenolol by direct and indirect approaches using liquid chromatography: A review.}, author={Batra S and Bhushan R}, journal={Biomed Chromatogr}, volume={32}, number={1}}

results.title: Effects of atenolol on exercise capacity in patients with mitral stenosis with sinus rhythm.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on exercise capacity in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Mitral_Valve_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008946 @@@mitral stenosis@@@ with sinus rhythm.

citations.NLM: Klein HO, Sareli P, Schamroth CL, Carim Y, Epstein M, Marcus B. Effects of atenolol on exercise capacity in patients with mitral stenosis with sinus rhythm. Am J Cardiol. 1985 Oct 1;56(10):598-601. PMID: 3901721

results.title: Acute symptomatic sinus bradycardia in a woman treated with pulse dose steroids for multiple sclerosis: a case report
results.text_hl: Her @SPECIES_9606 @@@outpatient@@@ dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, taken for symptomatic inappropriate @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Sinus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013616 @@@sinus tachycardia@@@, was resumed.

citations.NLM: Kundu A, Fitzgibbons TP. Acute symptomatic sinus bradycardia in a woman treated with pulse dose steroids for multiple sclerosis: a case report J Med Case Rep. 2015 Sep 24;9():216. PMID: 26400725
citations.BibTeX: @article{26400725, title={Acute symptomatic sinus bradycardia in a woman treated with pulse dose steroids for multiple sclerosis: a case report}, author={Kundu A and Fitzgibbons TP}, journal={J Med Case Rep}, volume={9}, pages={216}}

results.title: Metaproterenol intoxication in a dog.
results.text_hl: Administration of the beta blocking drugs @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ led to resolution of the clinical signs.

citations.NLM: Rush JE, Keene BW. Metaproterenol intoxication in a dog. J Am Vet Med Assoc. 1990 Nov 15;197(10):1351-3. PMID: 2266051
citations.BibTeX: @article{2266051, title={Metaproterenol intoxication in a dog.}, author={Rush JE and Keene BW}, journal={J Am Vet Med Assoc}, volume={197}, number={10}, pages={1351-3}}

results.title: [Effects of monotherapy with an alpha1-adrenoblocker doxazosin and its combination with beta1-adrenoblocker atenolol on hemodynamics, reversible myocardial ischemia in postmyocardial infarction patients with arterial hypertension].
results.text_hl: As all the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ developed @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Sinus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013616 @@@sinus tachycardia@@@ on day 5-10 of doxasozine treatment, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received additionally beta 1-adrenoblocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (12.5-25 mg/day) which adequately controlled heart rate.

citations.NLM: Tepliakov AT, Gavrilova NV, Garganeeva AA. [Effects of monotherapy with an alpha1-adrenoblocker doxazosin and its combination with beta1-adrenoblocker atenolol on hemodynamics, reversible myocardial ischemia in postmyocardial infarction patients with arterial hypertension]. Klin Med (Mosk). 2003;81(11):17-21. PMID: 14689703
citations.BibTeX: @article{14689703, title={[Effects of monotherapy with an alpha1-adrenoblocker doxazosin and its combination with beta1-adrenoblocker atenolol on hemodynamics, reversible myocardial ischemia in postmyocardial infarction patients with arterial hypertension].}, author={Tepliakov AT and Gavrilova NV and Garganeeva AA}, journal={Klin Med (Mosk)}, volume={81}, number={11}, pages={17-21}}

results.title: Hyperdynamic beta-adrenergic syndrome among Croatian soldiers engaged in battle.
results.text_hl: The ECG test showed @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Sinus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013616 @@@sinus tachycardia@@@ (heart rate > 100/min) but an otherwise normal function in group A.

citations.NLM: Heitzler VN, Bergovec M, Prpić H, Tomljenović M, Stancić V, Gopcević A, Mihatov S, Seni B, Beslin MB, Eremić Z. Hyperdynamic beta-adrenergic syndrome among Croatian soldiers engaged in battle. Wien Med Wochenschr. 1993;143(18):479-81. PMID: 8310702
